Name: J.K. Rowling
Bio: British author, best known for the Harry Potter series.

Name: George R.R. Martin
Bio: American novelist and short-story writer, famous for A Song of Ice and Fire.

Name: Agatha Christie
Bio: English writer known for her detective novels.

Name: J.R.R. Tolkien
Bio: Author of The Lord of the Rings series.

Name: Dan Brown
Bio: American author best known for The Da Vinci Code.
